name: Professional Licensing Guides
description: For immigrants who have careers as doctors, engineers, teachers, and other regulated professions in their home countries and need to earn a professional license to restart their careers in the U.S., we have developed licensing guides that will help with the job-seeking process. Note: nurses, lawyers, and public accountants are regulated in the U.S.; business managers and university professors are not. If you are one of these professionals, Upwardly Global’s professional licensing guides can help

howToGetIt: All Upwardly Global services are offered remotely at this time; however, in-person appointments are available upon request. Upwardly Global offers both in-person appointments at one of our four offices (San Francisco, New York City, Chicago, and Washington, D.C.) as well as remote services for individuals who are unable to visit our offices. Submit your application at: https://upwardlyglobal.my.site.com/s/registration?FID=DS&_gl=11kbcn46_gcl_auMTU0NjI0ODYwNi4xNzQ3NTIzMjg4_gaNzQyNzg5NjUzLjE3NDc1MjMyODg._ga_YQXG80G3DWczE3NDc1MjMyODckbzEkZzEkdDE3NDc1MjM0NzMkajYwJGwwJGgxMzg2MzU5MTUyJGRZTUhIMndNMHZOcUJmam1WV0lUWGNCVE9ual9VeTBYV29B
